name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Charges Forward
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard leads a ferocious charge into the heart of Marine defenses despite his injuries from Squard's betrayal.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his unwavering determination to save Ace regardless of personal harm.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard's Earthquake Tilts Marineford
keyMoments.description: Unleashes a catastrophic earthquake so massive that the entire island of Marineford tilts to one side, defeating John Giant with a single quake-infused punch.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most stunning displays of his world-shaking abilities, cementing his title as 'The Man Who Can Destroy the World.'
keyMoments.quote: How strong is that old man?! (Luffy's reaction)

abilities.description: A quake-infused punch so powerful it can tilt an entire island and create massive fissures in the ground and sea.

reveals.information: Can create earthquakes powerful enough to physically tilt the entire island of Marineford

keyMoments.title: Marco Comforts Squard
keyMoments.description: Marco approaches the grieving Squard and encourages him to repay his debt through action rather than tears.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Marco's leadership qualities and the Whitebeard Pirates' values of redemption through action.
keyMoments.quote: Will crying help set things right? Go and repay your debt.

relationships.description: Marco provides emotional support to Squard after his betrayal of Whitebeard, encouraging him to make amends.

evolutionMoments.description: Marco comforts Squard and encourages redemption through action.

reveals.information: Shows compassionate leadership by helping crew members through difficult emotional moments

keyMoments.title: Squard's Remorse
keyMoments.description: Squard wallows in grief over stabbing Whitebeard after being manipulated by the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional aftermath of his manipulation and the deep bond between Whitebeard and his subordinate captains.
keyMoments.quote: What have I done? I stabbed Pops!

keyMoments.title: Receives Encouragement from Marco
keyMoments.description: Marco encourages Squard to repay his debt through action rather than tears.

relationships.description: Views Whitebeard as a father figure and is devastated by his own betrayal.

evolutionMoments.description: Experiences deep remorse for stabbing Whitebeard under manipulation.

relationships.description: Receives emotional support and guidance from Marco.

reveals.information: Deeply remorseful for betraying Whitebeard and seeks redemption

keyMoments.title: Stabilizes Execution Platform with Other Admirals
keyMoments.description: Works together with Aokiji and Kizaru to keep the execution platform stable despite Whitebeard's massive earthquakes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the coordinated might of the Marine Admirals.

keyMoments.title: Unleashes Meteor Volcano (Ryusei Kazan)
keyMoments.description: Deploys his devastating Meteor Volcano technique, firing magma fists into the sky that rain down like meteors, melting the ice battlefield and damaging the Moby Dick.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of one of Akainu's most destructive techniques that dramatically shifts the tactical situation.

abilities.description: Creates a great number of magma fists that are fired into the sky to rain down upon the battlefield, causing enormous area damage and melting ice.

reveals.information: Can create and launch massive volleys of magma fists capable of melting entire ice battlefields

name.japanese: ジョン・ジャイアント

keyMoments.title: Confronts Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Steps forward to confront Whitebeard in an attempt to buy time and stop his advance.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a demonstration of Whitebeard's overwhelming power.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Whitebeard's Earthquake
keyMoments.description: Defeated by Whitebeard with a single quake-infused punch that breaks through the ice and bay.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power difference between even high-ranking Marine officers and Whitebeard.

keyMoments.title: Continues Charge Toward Execution Platform
keyMoments.description: Despite the activation of the encircling walls, Luffy presses forward with his allies in his desperate attempt to reach Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering determination to save his brother.

keyMoments.title: Despair as Situation Worsens
keyMoments.description: Luffy cries out in anguish as the Meteor Volcano melts the ice and the encircling walls trap the pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's emotional response to the increasingly desperate situation.

reveals.information: Acknowledges Whitebeard's overwhelming power while witnessing his earthquake abilities
